byline.original: By JAMES MacDONALD Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: RAF bombs mil objectives in Northern Italy and Sardinia
snippet: LONDON, Sept. 2--In bold attacks on a farflung series of objectives in Germany, the Netherlands, France and Italy this morning and last night, the Royal Air Force bombed shipping, munitions and airplane factories, oil depots, land ......

headline.main: TARGETS IN MUNICH BOMBED BY BRITISH; Heavy Damage Reported There and Elsewhere in Reich-- Bases in France Attacked
